sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:tagsFusionProteins: mCherry (N terminal on insert) Nuclear export signal (NES) (C terminal on insert) 6xHIS - T7 tag (gene 10 leader) - Xpress (TM) tag (N terminal on backbone)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: mCherry
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: monomeric derivative of DsRed fluorescent protein (Shaner et al., 2004)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: mCherry

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: T7 promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: promoter for bacteriophage T7 RNA polymerase
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: T7 promoter

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: leader peptide from bacteriophage T7 gene 10
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: promotes efficient translation in E. coli
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: T7 tag (gene 10 leader)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: T7 tag (gene 10 leader)
pRS-marker
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: pRS vectors, use to sequence yeast selectable marker
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pRS-marker

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refMethod: pcDNA3-mCherry-PKAsub-RLuc8N-NES was a gift from Jin Zhang (Addgene plasmid # 138211 ; http://n2t.net/addgene:138211 ; RRID:Addgene_138211)
sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:academicNonprofitTerms: UBMTA Takara Bio Limited Use Label License (formerly Clontech)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: BGH-rev
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Bovine growth hormone terminator, reverse primer. Also called BGH reverse
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: BGH-rev
NES
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: NES
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: nuclear export signal from the HIV Rev protein (Fischer et al., 1995)

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:purpose: Encodes substrate fragment of luminescence-based bimolecular PKA activity reporter (LumAKAR); cytosol targeted. Use in conjunction with pcDNA3-RLuc8C-FHA1-NES.

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: f1 ori
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: f1 bacteriophage origin of replication; arrow indicates direction of (+) strand synthesis
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: f1 ori

sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Encodes substrate fragment of luminescence-based bimolecular PKA activity reporter (LumAKAR); cytosol targeted. Use in conjunction with pcDNA3-RLuc8C-FHA1-NES..

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: M13 rev
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: common sequencing primer, one of multiple similar variants
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: M13 rev

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: AmpR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: confers resistance to ampicillin, carbenicillin, and related antibiotics
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: AmpR

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: vertebrate consensus sequence for strong initiation of translation (Kozak, 1987)
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: vertebrate consensus sequence for strong initiation of translation (Kozak, 1987)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: pBABE 3'
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: SV40 enhancer, reverse primer for pBABE vectors
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: pBABE 3'

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: M13 Reverse
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: M13 Reverse
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: In lacZ gene. Also called M13-rev

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:refBib: Luminescent kinase activity biosensors based on a versatile bimolecular switch. Herbst KJ, Allen MD, Zhang J. J Am Chem Soc. 2011 Apr 20;133(15):5676-9. doi: 10.1021/ja1117396. Epub 2011 Mar 25. 10.1021/ja1117396 PubMed 21438554

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lac promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: promoter for the E. coli lac operon
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lac promoter

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: SP6 promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: promoter for bacteriophage SP6 RNA polymerase
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: SP6 promoter
NeoR/KanR
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: confers resistance to neomycin, kanamycin, and G418 (Geneticin(R))
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: NeoR/KanR
Xpress(TM) tag
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: Xpress(TM) epitope tag, including an enterokinase recognition and cleavage site
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: Xpress(TM) tag

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: The lac repressor binds to the lac operator to inhibit transcription in E. coli. This inhibition can be relieved by adding lactose or isopropyl-beta-D-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG).
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lac operator
CMV-F
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Human CMV immediate early promoter, forward primer
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: CMV-F
CAP binding site
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: CAP binding site
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: CAP binding activates transcription in the presence of cAMP.
